svg.title: SmartDerivativeContract (ERC-6123). Variant with Settlement-Token and off-chain Valuation Service

g.text: SmartDerivativeContract (ERC-6123). Variant with Settlement-Token and off-chain Valuation Service
- transfer margin buffers and termination fees to SDC address for CP1 and CP2
- transfer optional Upfront Fee from Paying to Receiving Party
Caps Settlement Amount at Margin Buffer Level
' transfer settlement amount from net payer to net receiver
- transfer Settlement Amount from SDC Balance to Receiving Party
- transfer Termination Fee from SDC Balance to Receiving Party
- transfer Release remaining balances to parties
' optional time trigger to perform checks (e.g. pre-funding check)
- transfer Settlement Amount from SDC Balance to Receiving Party
- transfer Termination Fee from SDC Balance to Receiving Party
- transfer Release remaining balances to parties
